resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>41348d6b-8048-41cc-205b-72aa145ec783#1#4</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Jézus tanítja az apostolokat</string>
            <string language="en">Jesus teaches the apostles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jesus unterrichtet die Apostel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jésus enseigne les apôtres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jesus ensina os apostles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jesus insegna i apostles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ιησούς διδάσκει τους αποστόλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jesús enseña a apostles</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Jézus tanítja az apostolokat, egy katakomba falfestményén, Kr.u. 4. század.</string>
            <string language="en">Jesus teaches the apostles, on a wallpainting in a burial 4th century AD</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ókeresztény művészet,  temetkezés,  sírfestészet,  Kr.u. 4. század,  </string>
            <string language="en">Ancient Christian art,  bury,  grave painting, 4th century AD,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jesus unterrichtet die Apostel, auf einem 
Wallpainting in einer Beerdigung 4. Jahrhundert ANZEIGE</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jésus enseigne les apôtres, sur wallpainting 
dans une 4ème ANNONCE de siècle d'enterrement</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jesus ensina os apostles, em um wallpainting 
ANÚNCIO do século do enterro em um ô</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Jesus insegna i apostles, su un wallpainting in 
un quarto ANNUNCIO di secolo di sepoltura</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο Ιησούς διδάσκει τους αποστόλους, σε μια ΑΓΓΕΛΙΑ του 
4$ου αιώνα ενταφιασμών</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Jesús enseña a apostles, al wallpainting en un 
4to ANUNCIO del siglo del entierro</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Alte christliche kunst, Bedecken, ernster Anstrich, 4. 
Jahrhundert ANZEIGE,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Art chrétien antique, enfouissement, peinture grave, 
4ème ANNONCE de siècle,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Arte christian antiga, enterro, pintura grave, ô 
ANÚNCIO do século,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arte cristiana antica, fossa, pittura grave, quarto 
ANNUNCIO di secolo,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αρχαία χριστιανική τέχνη, θάβει, σοβαρή ζωγραφική, 
ΑΓΓΕΛΙΑ του 4$ου αιώνα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Arte cristiano antiguo, entierro, pintura grave, 4to 
ANUNCIO del siglo,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0

end:vcard</entity>

        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
